headline: Colgate-Palmolive Announces Executive Leadership Appointments
summary: NEW YORK, May 29, 2025--Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) today announced several executive leadership appointments that will take effect June 16, 2025.

headline: Piper Sandler Reiterates Overweight Rating on Colgate-Palmolive Amid Tariff Strategy
summary: Piper Sandler reiterated its $109 price target and Overweight rating on Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) on May 28. The update follows insights into Colgate’s success and future prospects, which were shared during a recent meeting with John Faucher, Chief Investor Relations Officer, and Noel Wallace, the company’s CEO. Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) appears to be managing the […]
